thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-MKS Instruments Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.90

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MKS Instruments Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.90
text:
MKS Instruments Inc:
* MKS INSTRUMENTS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.07 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.90 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.00 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE $550 MILLION TO $590 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $554 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $530.7 MILLION
* SEES Q2 GAAP NET INCOME COULD RANGE FROM $1.91 TO $2.18 PER DILUTED SHARE
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP NET EARNINGS COULD RANGE FROM $2.09 TO $2.36 PER DILUTED SHARE
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.06, REVENUE VIEW $541.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
